attributes.action: Captain Tom Moore. Make a special arrangement for him to receive a Knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: Grant this great man a Knighthood.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore has inspired the nation in raising millions for the NHS. It would be great if we could honour him a Knighthood for his 100th Birthday on the 30th April as a thank you from the nation.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
